thread.title: Dean
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Dean

author: Dean
title: Dean
text: When we went to HomeZone, we were wanting to purchase a loveseat. We were assisted by Bryce. Our questions about materials and types of loveseats were expertly answered. He had a lot of knowledge about the store and understood our concerns about the fabric. He was very helpful. We appreciated his assistance and with his help, we found the perfect loveseat we wanted. When we need other furniture for our home, we know where to go and who to see!
